purpose: To enable developers to quickly create AI-driven, serverless e-commerce platforms using a modular approach.
principle: Built with a serverless architecture using JavaScript, it leverages modern libraries and frameworks to offer modular components for e-commerce functionality.
reusability: Designed with modularity in mind, it allows developers to integrate various e-commerce components easily, supporting plugin architecture and API integrations.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and potential instability; requires JavaScript knowledge.
name: storecraft
description: ‚≠ê Rapidly build AI-powered, modular e-commerce backends with JavaScript
